attributes.action: Ban the cruelty to animals that goes on in zoos. Especially the spanking of primates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When I visited the primate enclosure at London Zoo with my family I was horrified to see two members of the junior staff spanking the monkey. This kind of behaviour is totally unacceptable, and the staff at the zoo should know better than to do this. 

This is not the first time I have seen this horrendous sight, a couple of months back, we saw the exact same thing at Whipsnade Zoo. I strongly recommend that you introduce new legislation about animal rights.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
